roles.title: Researcher
roles.description: Research-focused roles: UX research, design research, ethnography, and strategic insight.

roles.title: Design Engineer
roles.description: Bridge design and development: prototyping, creative coding, and translating concepts into working systems.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Design-led roles: interaction design, product design, and visual design.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Engineering roles: software development, systems architecture, and technical implementation.

roles.title: Creative Technologies
roles.description: Creative tech roles: installations, generative art, physical computing, and emerging media.
